content: I completely agree with your view. involving local musicians in the research process creates a sense of ownership and pride within the community. it shows that their heritage is valued and appreciated, and creates a space for them to showcase their musical tradition. this can help to preserve and honor their culture while also developing and showcasing it to a broader audience. by inviting local musicians to participate in the research process, they have a chance to showcase their talents, build connections with academics, and increase the visibility of their music. in conclusion, involving local musicians in the research process can foster cultural exchange, showcase cultural heritage, and create mutually beneficial relationships between communities and researchers.
